job description:
Requires a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Math or other closely related field. Two - Four years
Clinical Workflow knowledge in a HealthCare setting needed.

3+ years of solid experience with SQL | Oracle Programming Languages and tools.

Proficiency with report writing and development tools, Oracle DBMS, SQL, PL/SQL, and/or related tools strongly preferred.

Designs and maintains QM, Dashboard and RVU reports to accurately measure provider performance, on a monthly, quarterly, and annual basis. Consolidate application data and identify best practices for storage and retrieval. Assist with the development of client information management standards and evaluation of (reporting) technology tools. Support management report needs by providing proficient analysis of EMR, PM, Portal and Billing data and delivering results in an executive report.

Demonstrates proficiency in office software and programming to define project requirements, workflows, charts, programming sequences and (correlated) diagrams

JavaScript, .Net Framework, API, and Hadoop experience is a plus.

Organizational skills to effectively process all paperwork/products.

Possess a high degree of personal integrity and interpersonal skills.
Occasional ìOn-Callî duties

Demonstrate a willingness to commit additional time and effort necessary to complete project requests and meet defined timelines.
